name: CT Dose Reduction Statement
description: Standard radiation dose reduction statements for CT

options.label: Standard
options.output_text: This facility uses radiation dose reduction techniques including at least one of the following: automated exposure control, dose modulation, and/or iterative reconstruction.

options.label: Pediatric
options.output_text: This examination was performed using size-appropriate pediatric imaging protocols with radiation dose optimization techniques.

options.label: Low Dose
options.output_text: Low-dose technique was used. This facility uses radiation dose reduction techniques including automated exposure control, dose modulation, and iterative reconstruction.

options.label: Cardiac
options.output_text: ECG-gated acquisition was performed with prospective triggering for dose reduction. This facility uses radiation dose reduction techniques.
